item.title: [317] Delta: Adding emotes to items :Delta [317]
item.dc:creator: @boombaklat boombaklat
item.description:
@boombaklat wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:2, topic:335032”]The problem is that you’re putting it under a method that look for emote ID’s from the cache.

So technically what your code is doing is nothing because it’s looking for an emote ID and returning another emote ID.[/quote]

But the basket is on return 1836; to skip i changed it to 1501; and then it made me float?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Delta: Adding emotes to items :Delta [317]
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

The problem is that you’re putting it under a method that look for emote ID’s from the cache.

So technically what your code is doing is nothing because it’s looking for an emote ID and returning another emote ID.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Delta: Adding emotes to items :Delta [317]
item.dc:creator: @boombaklat boombaklat
item.description:
@boombaklat wrote:

Well i seen a server with a cape which when you wore you flew and i wanted to put this on my sevrer so i tried

i used the code:-
under: public int GetWalkAnim(int id)

if(id == 12114) // wngs
{
return 1501;
}

and :-
under: public int GetStandAnim(int id)

if(id == 12113) // wings
{
return 1501;
}

But theirs been no errors, just whenever i wore the cape it doesnt work.

Anyone able to help me out?

Thank you,

Read full topic
